name: Dead End Job (itch) (barkunjgames)
description:
Your boss has "volunteered" you for unpaid overtime at your graveyard job.
You are stuck watching a security monitor with 2 switches beside it. 
Some kids snuck into the graveyard when they shouldn't have.

What could possibly go wrong?

- CAN BE PLAYED ENTIRELY WITH THE TOBII EYETRACKER -
- Mouse controls also available -

Session Length: 8-10 Minutes
